H0.text: What occasionally Anglicised German word instructs that something is not permitted. Forbidden

H1.text: What occasionally Anglicised German word instructs that something is not permitted. Prohibiert

H2.text: What occasionally Anglicised German word instructs that something is not permitted. Nicht erlaubt

H3.text: What occasionally Anglicised German word instructs that something is not permitted. Verboten

A5.text: erlaubt, allowed, granted; opposite of verboten.
